name: You're 'The One,' Bullet!
description:
This is the ScoreSpace submission for my rage quit platformer, You're 'The One,' Bullet!

The theme of this jam was 'one bullet,' but I didn't want to make a game with a gun that only has one bullet. This is in a GameBoy style as I will be continuing to work on it for the GameBoy jam that is currently underway.

Controls:

A/Left key = left

D/Right key = right

Space = jump

Enter = action
